dasp5000.domain.audiocontainers

Class StereoAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • dasp5000.domain.audiocontainers.StereoAudio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AudioContainer

    public class StereoAudio
extends Object
implements AudioContainer
    A class to contain all the information needed to process an opened AudioInputStream's data.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StereoAudio(AudioFormat audioFormat)
      Creates a new AudioContainer object.
